game.name: Winter Memories
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: After the unforgettable summer memories you’ve made half a year ago, Yui, Rio, and Miyuki are back. With the change of seasons and the cold falling snow, a new page to your story is about to begin.
game.shortDescriptionEn: After the unforgettable summer memories you’ve made half a year ago, Yui, Rio, and Miyuki are back. With the change of seasons and the cold falling snow, a new page to your story is about to begin.

reviewHighlights.text: ★★★★★ summer memories의 후속작 전작을 해본 신사들에게도 안 해본 분들께도 추천드리는 야겜 당장 사세요! +) 후속작 계속 나와라 제발
